name: Pipe Burst
description:
Use WASD to move and the mouse to interact with objects!

Empty your buckets by bringing them up to the window and survive the flood for as long as you can!

Programmed by Joshua Marlowe [@JMarGameDesign]

Art by Björn Miner [@Bjornybaby]

Music & Sounds by Zenwa Shimabukuro [Zen Gets Yen, @zengetsyen]
